title: Horror Movie of the Year
review: Well, it's no only an horror movie, there's an emotional story between these kids, which by the way, the cast is perfect. Bill Skaarsgard as Pennywise is absolutely terrifying. At a first look doesn't felt like that but when you see him in action it's scary as f***. Andy Muschietti have proved us that he loves the genre, he made a good adaptation of the book.
